short_description: A natural sleep aid and eye relaxer, crafted from Grade 5A 100% organic mulberry silk. Only super-soft, super-smooth and skin-friendly silk offers the breathable, cool relaxation of the soothing masks found at the world's premier spas, a sleep-inducing gift for women, men, all skin types
ANTI-AGING -- Silk has been shown to reduce friction, which can reduce pressure on creased skin; Helping protect the delicate areas around your eyes by preventing marks that could cause wrinkles
100% COVERAGE & BETTER FIT -- A higher nose cutout conforms to your face contour and block the light underneath w/o putting pression on the bridge of noses

IDEAL for DRY-EYE SUFFERERS -- The ophthalmologist explained people who can't close their lids fully can experience extremely dry eyes, wear a shade that is against your eyelids it holds your eyes shut, so you don't wake up with dry, itchy eyes like the synthetic ones

GREAT ADDITION TO SLEEPING SUPPLEMENTS -- Silk fibers are less absorbent than cotton, poly satin or foam material, so they can help keep your expensive eye cream and skin moisture where they belong, which means more skincare stays on your face, saving you money and giving you that bedtime glow

FULLY ADJUSTABLE -- Expand from 15.8" to 27.6" in circumference, One-Size-Fits-All. Large, easy-to-adjust loop won't snag hair. The buckle stays at the back of your head, won't feel uncomfortable for side sleepers
COLORFAST & HYPOALLERGENIC -- Odor-free, non-toxic dyes and anti-irritation; NO stains concerns on bed sheets or pillow cases
CPAP compatible, easier to use with other machine mask and headgear

name: MATASSE 100% Mulberry Silk Sleep Mask 22 Momme Grade 6A - 3D Contoured Eye Mask for Sleeping, 14mm Deep Eye Cups, Total Blackout Blindfold for Women Men, Adjustable Strap, Side Sleeper (Black)
short_description: 100% PURE MULBERRY SILK, 22 MOMME GRADE 6A — Crafted from the highest quality silk available. While competitors use 16-19 momme, MATASSE uses premium 22 momme Grade 6A long-fiber mulberry silk on both sides for superior softness, breathability, and durability. OEKO-TEX Standard 100 certified — no harmful chemicals, naturally hypoallergenic, gentle on sensitive skin.

14MM DEEP 3D CONTOURED EYE CUPS — DEEPEST ON MARKET — Our 3D contoured design features industry-leading 14mm deep eye cavities (competitors average 10-12mm). Zero eye pressure allows natural blinking while protecting eyelashes and lash extensions. Perfect silk eye mask for sleeping without smudging makeup or damaging lash work.

TOTAL BLACKOUT SLEEP MASK WITH NOSE GUARD — Specially designed contoured nose bridge and curved side panels block 100% of light from every angle. Unlike other eye masks that leave gaps, our sleeping mask creates complete darkness for deeper REM sleep, faster sleep onset, and natural melatonin production. Ideal for daytime naps, night shifts, travel, and light-sensitive sleepers.

ADJUSTABLE SILK-COVERED STRAP — PERFECT FOR SIDE SLEEPERS — Fully adjustable elastic strap (18-26 inches) wrapped in 100% mulberry silk fits all head sizes without tangling hair or leaving marks. Ultra-lightweight design with zero temple pressure makes this the ideal sleep mask for side sleepers, back sleepers, and stomach sleepers. Wake up refreshed, never with strap marks.

ANTI-AGING SILK BENEFITS & LUXURY GIFT READY — Natural silk proteins reduce friction by 43% compared to cotton, helping prevent fine lines, wrinkles, and sleep creases around delicate eye area. Silk's natural thermoregulation keeps you cool in summer, warm in winter. Beautifully packaged. Perfect gift for birthdays, Mother's Day, Christmas, or anyone who values quality sleep and skincare.
